title: Rare skins
body: A lot of people complain that skins like grey ww and black alistar should never be brought back because they need to remain "special". How come skins like these can't be won by being at masters or challenger? It would be special still because you earn it instead of being lucky enough to of been playing at the convenient time.

replies.body:
black alistar sure, shouldn't be brought back

Grey ww tho. That's a different story.
Challenger Riven and Challenger Riven 2016 give precedent for Riot bringing back a skin that would never be brought back while maintaining the rarity of the original skin.

I feel there's a dif between pre-ordering a game to get the skin, vs getting a skin partway in a games life.

otherwise i want my king rammus.

Well, maybe one day you'll be able to get a "King Rammus 2017" so you can look like Bowser but people who owned King Rammus are still special.

(I wish I could get PAX Twisted Fate.)
Like who wanted the old grey ww when it looked lame? Now it looks really cool so its a shame.
